name: OnlyOneColor
description:
Only One Color:

Controls:
- Movement: A/D or left/right arrows keys for movement. 
- Switching Active Color: 1, 2 and 3 keys. 
- Restart Level: R

This simple game is about picking the right color at the right time to get through
the levels to the finish. There are 5 colors with different effects:
- Red: Bouncy
- Blue: Shrinking
- Yellow: Sticking to walls
- Purple: Faster movement
- Orange: Reverse gravity
- Green: Blocks become intangible

White blocks react to all colors, colored blocks only to their color, and black blocks to none. Unfortunately we ran out of time and ended up with only one half finished level ;)

Enjoy! Authors: Damian Knuchel, Samuel Börlin, Sven Staub, Renato Farruggio
